content.detailedDescription:
I was driving along division street in stevens point, wi, at approximately 7:38pm, tuesday, may 29th, when i saw a metallic silver spherical object hovering in the sky in front of me at about 30' off the horizon.  i immediately recognized that it was not an airplane or helicopter as it was completely round, hovered, and had no blinking lights.  

i kept my eyes on the object as i went through an intersection and observed it for appoximately 15 seconds before it simply disappeared.  i pulled the car over and parked along division street.  i scanned the sky for the object and it appeared again approximately 30 seconds later. it was in basically the same place, though a few degrees off from its original position.  once again, it appeared to be a metalic silver spherical object with a very distinct outline - no lights, wings, rotors.  i watched it for approximately 10 seconds before it disappeared or "winked out" once again.  

i continued to sit in the same position and scan the sky for 10 more minutes, but did not see it again.  

note 1: i don't know if it's relevant or not, but observing the object did not make me feel excited, scared or uneasy; i simply felt as if i was observing any other sort of object.  

note 2: this is the second time i have seen an object in the air above stevens point, wi, that fits the description of the object listed above. i did not report the object the first time i saw it.
content.summary: I observed a solid spherical object hover in the air, disappear, reappear and then disappear.

content.detailedDescription: The same glowing and pulsating and flashing orbs of light are again in the sky tonight. they are west of grove city. there is a plane flying around them, appears to be observing them.  right now
content.summary: 3-4 pulsating stationary and moving lights back in area. west of grove city, oh

content.detailedDescription: Heard police car radio report lights over the town.  wife and i went outside house and observed seven lights moving south to north in line astern.  est 30 seconds to one minute between lights.  view partly blocked by trees.  no wind, no sound from objects.  normal night sounds very light traffic sounds.  heard radio comment about 10:32 pm on may 27.  lights study reddish mixed with gold color.  study light, study flight caracteristics. no aircraft or chopper seen. lights glowing, no bean or reflections.  did not illuminate area.
content.summary: Herd law enforcement comment, observe 7 lights moving south to north about 1 city block away and est 200 feet high est speed 50 mph

content.detailedDescription: At 10pm cst my wife and i went out on our front porch to smoke before going to bed. i like to look at the stars which is how noticed one that was moving. we had been outside for a few minuets when i saw a star like object traveling north. at first i thought it might be an airplane, but i did not see any red or green marker lights. it suddenly grow very bright then faded  as it continued to travel north. it continued to fade until we could no longer see it. soon after there was a second light that appeared in the same area as the first but traveled more to the nnw. the second also grew bright before fading from sight. a third showed up which i did not see before. it started as a bright flare which dimmed and traveled to the east. the fourth showed up in the same location as the 1st 3, but began as a bright red flash which was followed by 4 progressively weaker flashes then it dimmed from sight. the fifth showed up just nw of the fourth stayed dim and traveled to the ne. i then noticed a sixth light coming from the nw across the handle of the big dipper. after about 1 min it dimmed from sight. the last one we saw was more to the east traveling south. it repeated what we had seen with the first 2 starting out dim then got very bright. it stayed very bright for much longer than the others but then faded very fast be for we lost sight of it. soon after the last sighting we saw a plane to the north traveling east at high alt, but you could still see the head light and flashing red and green marker lights. then another plane towards the south all lights clear on it as well. we saw the 2 planes between 10:55 and 11. the 7 unknown lights were spaced out from 10-10:50. i have seen plenty of planes helo's etc and these lights were not like anything i have seen before. i feel like i have seen something truly amazing.
content.summary: 7 high alt lights

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking and looking at the stars as i often do at night. when my fiance saw an object no bigger than a speck traveling in a straight line overhead that he pointed out to me. there was no sound associated with the object that we could hear. it was hard to see at first but as it kept traveling it brighten quite a bit and then dimmed down again and disappeared.
content.summary: Light traveling slowly in a straight line brightened and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking and looking at the stars as i often do at night. when my fiance saw an object no bigger than a speck traveling in a straight line overhead that he pointed out to me. there was no sound associated with the object that we could hear. it was hard to see at first but as it kept traveling it brighten quite a bit and then dimmed down again and disappeared.
content.summary: Light traveling slowly in a straight line brightened and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: We were on motorcycles heading south on i-17, between cactus & peoria when we spotted in the sky 8 blue lights, all in a row, not on a set course but but moving in different directions. it as a flowing motion, but yet the direction was very erratic.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 6-8 blue lights in straight line, moving very erraticly, not set patttern or direction.

content.detailedDescription: We were on motorcycles heading south on i-17, between cactus & peoria when we spotted in the sky 8 blue lights, all in a row, not on a set course but but moving in different directions. it as a flowing motion, but yet the direction was very erratic.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 6-8 blue lights in straight line, moving very erraticly, not set patttern or direction.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting near the beach in ventura when i saw an orange light ascending over the ocean. soon after that i noticed another and another. 5 in all flying upwards at the same speed close together. there was no sound. the first stalled and then turned upwards, when the second reached the same spot it too turned upward and so on all turning in the same spot going the same direction. i called it in to 9-11, that minute, and i was directed to an airport phone # that was a recorded message. apparently they didnt take me serious or didnt want me to report it. very strange indeed,. my friend also witnessed the exact event about a mile away. it should be noted there is a military base 10 miles south of here.
content.summary: 5 orange lights flying in the same pattern all asended in the same spot same direction

content.detailedDescription: Myself, son and my son's friend were fishing on lake hickory on memorial day. we were slowing moving heading toward where we launched the boat when my son's friend said what is that in the sky. we looked and could see about 5 objects in the sky at one time. they were moving slowly from south to north about a half mile or so up. we wanted a better view so we speed up the boat to the main channel of lake hickory near moore's ferry subdivision and stopped the boat to watch. the red glowing arrow shaped objects were spaced unevenly across the sky and one at a time would disappear into the clouds to our north (alexander county side)about 30 degrees from horizon. we watched to the north as the last one was getting close to going into the clouds out of site and then to our south another one comes above the horizon in our site moving slowing in the same direction. there was a few clouds in the sky but they were not moving much at all and were lower then the objects as the objects would go behind the clouds and come out the other side. it would take about 5 minutes for the objects to come in then go out of sight to our north. the objects appeared to be floating across the sky, and the size of them were large about 1/4 the size of a full moon or so. the triangle part was about 1/3 the size of the length of the shaft. this is my best guess but i would say they were 75 feet to maybe as much as 150 feet long and maybe 50 feet wide. we got one picture of the object with my older cell phone but it doesn't look like nothing more then a small reddish dot. in all we saw about 10 objects as one would appear about every 5 minutes or so. we noticed that only one fast moving bass boat passed us in the 30 minutes we were sitting there but they didn't see it i guess because this would really grab your attention as it was like nothing i had ever seen, bright glowing red like neon glows and had a slight flickering to the color. i came home and google searched the computer but found nothing, also watched the charlotte news channels and heard nothing. today i called the hickory airport, the lady said she had no other reports and at 9pm they close the tower. i know someone had to see these things in the sky somewhere in catawba or alexander county.
content.summary: Large red glowing arrow shaped objects slowly crossed sky moving silently from south to north

content.detailedDescription:
My wife saw what appeared to be two satellites travelling in tandem with another companion of exact brightness from west to east across sky and called me out to see it.  we both realized this was strange and followed the two objects from the back yard to the front yard as they crossed the sky.  they appeared as two bright star like objects travelling in tandem together, as if they were tethered by a solid line in between, like lights on each end of a ruler.  

the objects rotated and changed direction abruptly to the north, back to the middle of the sky.  when we looked back to the middle of the sky, we were stunned to realize that there were 10-12 pairs of these same lights, all in various distances from each other, some moving in all different directions, some stationary.  they were much brighter than the rest of the visible stars in the sky over the city of minneapolis. they covered much of the visible sky. it was amazing to realize how many there were, right above us.  they were definitely not stars,  as we referenced star maps to make sure.  definitely not planes as we skywatch a lot and know what planes at high and low altitudes look like.  these did not travel like planes, with abrupt stops and starts, as well as changes of direction.  

sometimes one of the lights would split from its partner, speed up across the sky, change directions and then appear in a different location with a new partner (emerging once it stopped). 

other pairs moved slowly across the sky, while some remained stationary.  

the moving objects tended to remain visible for longer periods of time.  unlike satellites which typically fade as they move across the sky due to reflecting sunlight, these stayed the same brightness, unless they were stationary.   the stationary pairs of lights would dim, pulsate and become bright again at random frequency.

we watched these lights  for approximately 15-20 minutes before cloud cover moved into the area and obscured them from view.

i must qualify, these objects moved in all different directions, and at varying speeds from rapid to very slow.  it was not cloud cover that made it look like stars were moving.  
 
my wife and i both saw this and are avid star gazers. we have never seen anything like this before.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Multiple pairs of lights

content.detailedDescription: We were swimming in the back yard when i jokingly mentioned a small craft in the sky. it was moving rather quickly at first and then it seemed to slow down a considerable amount. everyone else saw it too. it became a lot less funny and more serious when all of us realized we were looking at a ufo. before yesterday they were just a joke, ya know? it disappeared after five or ten minutes. an unmarked plane came through within seconds of it disappearing, and it was even more obvious that what we'd seen before was not a plane. it was oval/almond shaped, very smooth around with no sharp edges or corners and fairly bright, it looked as though the sky around it had a halo effect and was slightly darker than the rest of the sky. i have a picture i took on my iphone where you can see the light from the craft, but not make out the craft itself because of the poor quality.
content.summary: Almond/oval shaped, very bright

content.detailedDescription: They are here and they are abundent there are many i found the plase were they live in the mountians looking up into the rocks from below in the past 2 days i found a plase were i been looking from above looking down upon then.    ontop of the rock formation are plat forms were they are. found a hanger were they work on ships  a realy big ship they were unlooding cargo how they move freely in the mountains i found a entrense  in the mountain a doorway that conects into ther relm but am afaid to inter cause i dont know what to expect iv seen them they came to me in all forms and creatures it is so amaseing they invite to go with them i dont know what is stoping me from intering there relm i dont know if i can return or if they will let me once i enter they have shone me so of them so far but it is only the begining of all i can learn from them everthing i know so far is that they will not hurt me cause they   gould have a long time ago i think they are fasanated by me or my actions cause no other humans are able to be in there presents  they serounded me i sat humbely amunst them then 3 elders came to me serounded by there gards they offer me them self to be one with them i responded that after dark my fears are so grate and tearafieing that i cannot stay through time maby i can stay
content.summary: I found them or they led me to them and there are many

content.detailedDescription: 5/24/12 traveling west through hartsville, in at 4:30am observed from my car on my right a circular orb orange in color and was pulsating.  this was above tree height and was 300 to 400 feet from me. at arms length it looked to be two foot across (big)
content.summary: Driving west on st rd 46 right before hartsville observed 3 to 400 ft to my right  pulsating ball of orange light

content.detailedDescription:
Over the past couple of weeks i have begun taking pictures @ around or before 8pm to put on facebook. last night i went out to take a few shots which are generally done of the western sky. as i looked to the south, the colors of the sky were so beautiful and it was about to rain (again), so
i started taking shots one after another. it started to shower so i went  
in to take a look and choose a pic for facebook. that is when i noticed the strange looking white spot on one of the pictures. it looke so out of place and i had not noticed it as i looked through the lens. the object looks white against a purple/pink/smoky grey sky and it is triangular shaped although from the distance that it was taken there are no sharp looking edges. the moment that i saw it on my camera, i immediatelty uploaded to my computer to get a closer look at it and it looks extremely odd. all of the pictures were taken in the same direction of the sky one after the other.

i called my husband to come in to take a look and tell me if he could 
explain what he thought it might me...He could not. i have to say that i was not only surprised at what is in the picture, but kind of excited too.
content.summary: Took pictures of sky, turned up on one pic.

content.detailedDescription:
First time i have seen an event. huge skeptic here! i was in a public pool with another lady who was swimming laps. i looked up as i often do and immediately saw two glowing orange objects moving side by side in erratic, uneven flying movement......Similar to motion of slowly reeling in a lure while fishing. 
     i was so struck dumb-founded......I yelled at the lady swimming....Pointed up...And said "do you see this?????   she did!   saying "what is it? over and over.....We agreed it was not one of the many commercial jets seen in the area!! and we could tell the objects moved like no known flying machine
so. 2 glowing orange objects moving from south to north in an erratic flying pattern with no: sound, vapor trail...Objects moved over us seeming to be high up the clear sky....Hovered over aliso viejo to the north of us....Then changed directions they both moved south again. while the 2 objects were above us i could make out square like patterns of red and orange pulsating lights underneath....!!
then, suddenly one glowing object quickly starting getting dimmer!! it was ascending very fast with no noise at all. seconds later, the remaining glowing object quickly ascended getting dimmer as it went seemingly straight up! and that was it! both objects gone. there was completely clear skies, planes flying all around in their regular patterns. i thought that surely some pilots and some passengers must have seen what we did! 
     my reaction afterwords was shock and disbelief......And comforted that i alerted a stranger who saw exactly what i did! being a science enthusiast, i am very confident i saw 2 glowing objects that moved and behaved as no other known flying machines i could think of.
     i stand by this true and accurate story, welcome any inquiries. most of all, i want to know what it was that we saw last night???
sincerely,

andy marshall
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Spotted with another witness at 9:18pm, may 28th; 2 orange glowing ufo's over laguna niguel

content.detailedDescription: Monkey cheese butts and random stuff oh and aliens they wanted to know where my leader was so i said no and they vaporized my friend so now i am sad
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Blimp,   Boomerang,   Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Cone,   Chevron,   Circle,   Cross,   Cylinder,   Diamond,   Disc,   Egg,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Triangle
content.summary: It was fluffy and looked like cheese

content.detailedDescription:
I was working outside and saw a shadow appear on the street, assuming it was a large bird i looked up and saw a silver verticle swath of an object moving slower than the wind, steady speed (maybe 4mph), just over the power lines and traveling inline with the power lines. (wind was blowing in a slightly different direction)

the sunlight reflected off it and it had bubble like impressions in the surface, the lower part was dark and i didn't see it clearly.

i walked around my vehicle to see it before the tree obstructed it's view, i went out to the street and it was gone. no ballons, birds, planes or other objects was in the sky.

i saw it for a total of about 10 seconds and about 30 some feet in the air.

it looked to me like the magnetic field from the power lines exposing the tangent of a sphere but not more than a few feet wide and 9 feet high was exposed.
content.summary: Silver object moving slow over power lines

content.detailedDescription:
5-23-2012 clear day with no clouds in the area, wind is about 10mph from the nw and the time of the sighting was around 2:40pm in roseville, ca.  oval silver/white object (same shape, color and size as sighting on 2/1/12 case number 35395) but this time it was traveling from a southwest direction to the northeast (more north than east). the oval object just seemed to appear out of nowhere all of a sudden in the sky (it just faded in from the background sky color). it was moving at a moderately steady speed about that as a normal commercial jet when all of a sudden it shot off at incredible speed in a perfectly straight line (as if it was fired out of a gun). the object maintained the same level altitude and direction until it was out sight. the object did not produce any contrail or sounds. total time in my view was somewhere between 30 seconds to one minute before it was out of sight.

 disbelieving what i just saw i continued to watch the same area of the sky and about 5 to 10 minutes later the object returned but this time the object just appeared as if it blinked in (like someone turned on a light switch). disbelieving what i was seeing again i lifted up my polarized sunglasses to maybe get a clearer view of the object but when i tilted up my sunglasses (never taking my eyes off the object) the object would seem to fade into the background sky color. i flipped my sunglasses up and down several times with the same result. with the glasses on i could see the object in the distance but with the sunglasses off the object would fade out into the sky colors and become nearly impossible to see. the oval object just hovered motionless in the same spot in the sky for about 30 seconds before it headed off at a very high rate of speed to the northeast (more east than north this time) until it was out of sight.

 about 10 minutes later a large jet passed across my location at about the same altitude as the oval object was just seen at. i watched the jet until it reached just about the same distance away from me as the oval object and the jet was clearly producing a contrail behind it. at that range the jets wings, tail and the cigar shaped body were still clearly visible (the jet still looked clearly like a plane/jet) nothing like what the "oval object" looked like at that distance. the oval object viewed at the same range as the jet had no wings, no tail section, and it did not produce a contrail when it moved - it was just a symmetrical oval shape. i even flipped my polarized glasses up and down several times just like i did when viewing the "oval object" but with the jet it had no effect what so ever on my ability to see it clearly at that range.
content.summary: Large symmetrical silver/white/reflective oval object 2nd sighting in 3 months

content.detailedDescription: Later in evening we were experiencing some high gusts of winds while camping in the front royal area in va. by 9 pm the weather had calmed and we could see stars.  then we saw an object fly over us but not directly.  it came from our right into the middle of the sky and seemed to stop.  we had plenty of time to watch it and becuase we were being so load my husband came from his tent to see what all the fuss was about.  when it first apeared when it first flew in to me it looked like a tear drop but with no tale at all.  it centered itself in the sky and appeared to hover in one position for almost 3-5 minutes before we realized it had taken a 90 degree turn and was moving up and away from us.  its center looked dark read and the outside a dark orange.  we were looking for shooting stars and then this.  no one had no explanation for what we all just was. after the sighting and some discussion we went to bed after the high winds and lighting returned about 2 hours later and then we went to bed.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Came from right side of sky straight seem to stay in 1 place then turned 90 degr. and flew up and away from us. saw it while camping

content.detailedDescription: We saw a baseball shape ufo with a smaller ball on top of it. new years eve. clear skies and all.
content.summary: Came from the east zig zagging, then shot south.

content.detailedDescription:
I looked up and over as i was on my way to work. as i looked up i saw a cigar or disc from the side was white but not reflective and just sitting behind the power lines at first i thought it was a plane. then after a few seconds i noticed the plane was not moving. 

i asked the driver to look he said he saw something, and i watched for at least 5 - 6 seconds, when the trees blocked our view we decided to turn around and take a look again. the object was gone.

it definately was not an airplane - there was no wings and it was hovering still.
content.summary: Looked like a cigar or disc from the side was white but not reflective and just sitting behind the power lines

content.detailedDescription: I was getting ready to grill some hamburgers in our front yard when my 12 year old son asked what that was in the sky. i looked up and said i didn't know and quickly pulled out my phone to take a picture. when i first viewed the object it was at a high altitude above the tree level at one horizon. i took one picture and in that time it had covered nearly half of my viewable sky. i was able to take a second picture before it became unviewable, going past the tree line at the oposite horizon. this object was traveling very fast and had no noticeable wing span even when zooming in on the picture i took later. simply put it looked like a pill tablet. my 12 year old son was also a witness to this.
content.summary: No wings were observed on object. it was not plane shaped. it traveled from horizon to horizon in less than a minute.

content.detailedDescription: The picture quality is excellent. i have scanned at a low resolution for uploading. pictures were found at a garage sale.
content.features: Dome,  Window(s),  Patterned Surface,  Appendage(s),  Wings
content.summary: Old ufo pictures from a garage sale

content.detailedDescription: I had got up to let the dog out and he didn't want to go out so i stepped outside and noticed a glowing orange white light over the back yard above the trees. it didn't make a sound. in fact the air was quiet with no frogs croaking. the sky was clear. if i held out my pointer finger the object would be the smaller than a #2 pencil eraser. as i watched it fly it seemed to wobbled for lack of a better word just slightly. as it moved across the sky north by slightly east when it got behind the tree it made a slight right and proceeded on a more easterly course. i live under one of the flight paths at sea tac airport and an occasional fly by from joint base lewis mcchord but this wasn't one of those aircraft. as i watched it fly away when it disappeared from view the neighbors dog barked and the frogs started croaking again
content.summary: Orangish white glowing light
